mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( `USER_NO`, `TITLE`, `CONTENT`, `UPLOAD_DATE`, `HASHTAG`, `MODIFIED_DATE`, `STATUS`, `HIT`) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{hashtag}, null, '1', '0')
mapper.select: SELECT Post_ID as postId, USER_NO as userNo, TITLE as title, CONTENT as content, UPLOAD_DATE as uploadDate, HASHTAG as hashtag, MODIFIED_DATE as modifiedDate, STATUS as status, HIT as hit FROM POST WHERE STATUS = 1

SELECT Post_ID as postId, USER_NO as userNo, TITLE as title, CONTENT as content, UPLOAD_DATE as uploadDate, HASHTAG as hashtag, MODIFIED_DATE as modifiedDate, STATUS as status, HIT as hit FROM POST WHERE STATUS = 1 AND Post_ID = #{postId}
